item.title: NICE TO HAVE: Kitsune questions and answers API tester
item.description:
Pontifications

Checker 1 of the Kitsune questions and answers API. Call the API and then

  1. Check that every field is present and new fields haven’t been added or old fields deleted
  2. Check every field’s type is correct, string, date, integer

Checker 2

  1. Check a specific question and specific answer and ensure all values are correct

item.title: HowTo: Concat multiple CSV Files into one using head and sed
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Combining multiple CSV files with the same headers is easy using head -1 and sed 1d!
head -1 file1.csv > final.csv
for filename in $(ls file*.csv); do sed 1d $filename >> final.csv; done
